query.comment: The system never reaches a deadlock state

query.formula: A<> forall(i : enemyId_t) (EnemyProcess(i).Left_Map or EnemyProcess(i).Dead or EnemyProcess(i).End)
query.comment: Eventually, all enemies either attack the Main Tower or leave the map

query.formula: A<> forall(i : enemyId_t) ((enemies[i].type == CIRCLE and isMainTower(enemies[i].pos)) imply ((GameController.gameTimer - enemies[i].spawnTime) <= (26 * CIRCLE_SPEED)))
query.comment: All Circles reach the tower or exit within 26 (total path length) * CIRCLE_SPEED time units

query.formula: A<> forall(i : enemyId_t) ((enemies[i].type == SQUARE and isMainTower(enemies[i].pos)) imply ((GameController.gameTimer - enemies[i].spawnTime) <= (26 * SQUARE_SPEED)))
query.comment: All Squares reach the tower or exit within 26 (total path length) * SQUARE_SPEED time units
Enemies are always either on a path or at the Main Tower
